@graph.name: Finding the Muon Stopping Site: pymuon-suite in Galaxy
@graph.description:
## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Finding the muon stopping site with pymuon-suite in Galaxy](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/materials-science/tutorials/muon-stopping-sites-muairss-uep/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
